title: builder: output to stderr if the cmd fails and reporting is disabled
body:
I run the following command with a script that doesn't exist (asdsda.bash).

```
builder -build -rev=1a4c984baea846a06e95440b2192eec1bc29917a -v -report=false -cmd="asdsda.bash"  linux-amd64
```

The output:
```
# builder -build -rev=1a4c984baea846a06e95440b2192eec1bc29917a -v -report=false -cmd="asdsda.bash"  linux-amd64
2015/01/14 23:11:57 Found old workspace, will use it
2015/01/14 23:11:57 running [git rev-parse 1a4c984baea846a06e95440b2192eec1bc29917a] in /tmp/gobuilder/goroot
2015/01/14 23:11:57 linux-amd64 building 1a4c984baea846a06e95440b2192eec1bc29917a
cd /tmp/gobuilder/goroot
git pull --ff-only
cd .
git clone /tmp/gobuilder/goroot /tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-1a4c984baea8/go
cd /tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-1a4c984baea8/go
git checkout 1a4c984baea846a06e95440b2192eec1bc29917a
2015/01/14 23:11:59 running [/tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-1a4c984baea8/go/src/asdsda.bash] in /tmp/gobuilder/linux-amd64-1a4c984baea8/go/src
```
